email_footer_content:
Copyright © 2022 Pass the Keys® Limited, All rights reserved.

1st Floor, 85 Great Portland Street, London, United Kingdom W1W 7LT

Please do not reply to this email. You are receiving this email because you are subscribed to https://book.passthekeys.com
homey_subject_new_user_register: Thank you for registering to stay with Pass the Keys®
homey_new_user_register:
Hi there,

A new account has been created at book.passthekeys.com allowing you to book our properties.

Your username is: {user_login_register}

You can manage your account here

If you have any enquiries about this account or do not believe you registered with the site, please contact us at reservations@passthekeys.co.uk
homey_error_booking_admin:
There was an error whlile booking! Please contact us The user {first_name} {last_name} tried to make a reservation and something went wrong.. please contact him. Listing name: {listing_name} Check in: {check_in_date} Check out: {check_out_date} Guests: {guests} Thank you for choosing Homey! Homey Team.

The following guest has attempted a reservation using book.passthekeys.com but the reservation failed.

{first_name} {last_name}
{email}
{phone}
{listing_name}
Check in:{check_in_date} Check out: {check_out_date}
{reservation_amount}

 

Actions required:
1. Please check with a member of the direct booking team to confirm whether payment was already made.

  1. If payment was successful, manually add the booking for the above property and dates. Please send email confirmation to the guest.

  2. If payment was successful and the dates are no longer available, please call the customer to offer alternative accommodation.

  3. If payment was unsuccessful, please call the customer to instruct them to attempt the booking again.
homey_error_booking_user:
Dear {first_name} {last_name} ,

Unfortunately an error occurred whilst booking your stay at {listing_name} for the dates {check_in_date} and {check_out_date}

A member of our Guest Support team will call you to rectify this error.

We apologise for the inconvenience.

Kind regards
Pass the Keys
homey_subject_reservation_booked_partial: Put it in your diary! Your stay has been booked on {site_title}
homey_reservation_booked_partial_payment:
Hi {first_name}

Your reservation is confirmed!

Thank you for booking, we can't wait to welcome you to {listing_name}!

We are so excited to host you and are dedicated to providing you with a five star experience. We will be in contact with you again closer to your stay and will send the check-in information (access, door code etc.) one day prior to your arrival. In the meantime, please take a look at the information below.

 

  1. If you are a first time guest with us at Pass the Keys, you will receive an email from our verification platform partner SUPERHOG. If you have stayed with us before, you will not receive this email.

 

We use SUPERHOG because they not only verify you, the guest, but also us as the property managers. You can trust us to provide you with the stay you have booked. SUPERHOG also backs this up with their insurance. If something goes wrong (and we all know accidents can happen) they will step in and take care of it. We therefore have no reason to take a damage deposit. It is a win-win for both you and us at Pass the Keys. If you have any questions, let us know.

 

In the email there will be instructions on how to complete the verification process. It is easy and quick to complete. Please do it asap as our booking conditions are subject to the successful guest verification process being conducted prior to check in. 

 

Guests who have not completed the verification process will not be sent relevant access information and Pass the Keys reserves the right to cancel the booking subject to our cancellation policy.

 

  1. You will also receive a receipt from Stripe (sent in a separate email). Please use this or the receipt available in the booking portal as proof of payment. We are unable to provide a VAT invoice for this booking as VAT is not applicable.




  1. If you agreed to pay part now, part later, you will receive a payment reminder email from Pass the Keys with a payment link to the email address provided when payment is due. The balance will be due 14 days before the check-in date. If full payment isn’t received 14 days before the check-in date, we will cancel the reservation and refund the part payment amount.

 

If there is anything we can do to make your stay more comfortable, please let us know. We look forward to hosting you and thanks again for booking on the Pass the Keys website.

Kind regards

Pass the Keys

Horay! You received a new reservation on {site_title}
Confirm Availability Confirm

Thank you for choosing Homey!
Homey Team.
homey_confirm_reservation:
So far so good! Host confirmed availability for your reservation.
Complete the payment due Pay Now

Thank you for choosing Boostly!
homey_subject_booked_reservation: Put it in your diary! Your stay has been booked on {site_title}
homey_booked_reservation:
Your reservation is confirmed!

Thanks for booking, we can't wait to welcome you to {listing_name}

Number of guests: {guests}
Check-in date: {check_in_date}
Check-out date: {check_out_date}
Address: {property_address}

View booking details by clicking here

Thank you for booking directly through Pass the Keys.

Booking conditions are subject to the successful guest verification process being conducted prior to check in. Our verification platform partner Superhog reaches out to all primary guests at the point of booking to support the verification process.

Guests who have not completed verification will not be sent relevant access information, and Pass The Keys reserves the right to cancel the booking subject to the company cancellation policy should the guests not provide.

We are unable to provide a VAT Invoice for this booking as VAT is not applicable. Please use the Stripe receipt (sent separately) and the receipt available in the booking portal as proof of payment.

homey_payout_request:
Hi {host_name},
We wanted to let you know that your payout request received.

Your payout will be {payout_amount}.

Your payout will be processed as part of our normal schedule. You will receive an email when your payout has been processed
homey_payout_request_completed:
Hi {host_name},
It's Payday! We just processed your payout for {payout_amount} less {transfer_fee} transaction fee.
Happy Spending!
homey_payout_request_cancelled:
Hi {host_name},
Your payout request for {payout_amount} has been cancelled.
Thank You
